original_text: When the Israelites went to fight against their enemies, the Lord turned against them. He punished them, as he said he would do. So the Israelites were in great trouble.
korean_text: 그들이 어디로 가든지 여호와의 손이 그들에게 재앙을 내리시니 곧 여호와께서 말씀하신 것과 같고 여호와께서 그들에게 맹세하신 것과 같아서 그들의 괴로움이 심하였더라

sentences.original_text: When the Israelites went to fight against their enemies
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 사람들이 그들의 적들과 싸우러 갔을 때

sentences.original_text: as he said he would do
So the Israelites were in great trouble
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 이스라엘 사람들은 큰 곤경에 빠졌다
